23 /**
24  * @file
25  * libavformat/libavcodec demuxing and muxing API example.
26  *
27  * Remux streams from one container format to another.
28  * @example remuxing.c
29  */
30 
31 #include <libavutil/timestamp.h>
32 #include <libavformat/avformat.h>
33 
34 static void log_packet(const AVFormatContext *fmt_ctx, const AVPacket *pkt, const char *tag)
35 {
36  AVRational *time_base = &fmt_ctx->streams[pkt->stream_index]->time_base;
37 
38  printf("%s: pts:%s pts_time:%s dts:%s dts_time:%s duration:%s duration_time:%s stream_index:%d\n",
39  tag,
40  av_ts2str(pkt->pts), av_ts2timestr(pkt->pts, time_base),
41  av_ts2str(pkt->dts), av_ts2timestr(pkt->dts, time_base),
42  av_ts2str(pkt->duration), av_ts2timestr(pkt->duration, time_base),
43  pkt->stream_index);
44 }
45 
46 int main(int argc, char **argv)
47 {
48  AVOutputFormat *ofmt = NULL;
49  AVFormatContext *ifmt_ctx = NULL, *ofmt_ctx = NULL;
50  AVPacket pkt;
51  const char *in_filename, *out_filename;
52  int ret, i;
53  int stream_index = 0;
54  int *stream_mapping = NULL;
55  int stream_mapping_size = 0;
56 
57  if (argc < 3) {
58  printf("usage: %s input output\n"
59  "API example program to remux a media file with libavformat and libavcodec.\n"
60  "The output format is guessed according to the file extension.\n"
61  "\n", argv[0]);
62  return 1;
63  }
64 
65  in_filename = argv[1];
66  out_filename = argv[2];
67 
68  av_register_all();
69 
70  if ((ret = avformat_open_input(&ifmt_ctx, in_filename, 0, 0)) < 0) {
71  fprintf(stderr, "Could not open input file '%s'", in_filename);
72  goto end;
73  }
74 
75  if ((ret = avformat_find_stream_info(ifmt_ctx, 0)) < 0) {
76  fprintf(stderr, "Failed to retrieve input stream information");
77  goto end;
78  }
79 
80  av_dump_format(ifmt_ctx, 0, in_filename, 0);
81 
82  avformat_alloc_output_context2(&ofmt_ctx, NULL, NULL, out_filename);
83  if (!ofmt_ctx) {
84  fprintf(stderr, "Could not create output context\n");
85  ret = AVERROR_UNKNOWN;
86  goto end;
87  }
88 
89  stream_mapping_size = ifmt_ctx->nb_streams;
90  stream_mapping = av_mallocz_array(stream_mapping_size, sizeof(*stream_mapping));
91  if (!stream_mapping) {
92  ret = AVERROR(ENOMEM);
93  goto end;
94  }
95 
96  ofmt = ofmt_ctx->oformat;
97 
98  for (i = 0; i < ifmt_ctx->nb_streams; i++) {
99  AVStream *out_stream;
100  AVStream *in_stream = ifmt_ctx->streams[i];
101  AVCodecParameters *in_codecpar = in_stream->codecpar;
102 
103  if (in_codecpar->codec_type != AVMEDIA_TYPE_AUDIO &&
104  in_codecpar->codec_type != AVMEDIA_TYPE_VIDEO &&
105  in_codecpar->codec_type != AVMEDIA_TYPE_SUBTITLE) {
106  stream_mapping[i] = -1;
107  continue;
108  }
109 
110  stream_mapping[i] = stream_index++;
111 
112  out_stream = avformat_new_stream(ofmt_ctx, NULL);
113  if (!out_stream) {
114  fprintf(stderr, "Failed allocating output stream\n");
115  ret = AVERROR_UNKNOWN;
116  goto end;
117  }
118 
119  ret = avcodec_parameters_copy(out_stream->codecpar, in_codecpar);
120  if (ret < 0) {
121  fprintf(stderr, "Failed to copy codec parameters\n");
122  goto end;
123  }
124  out_stream->codecpar->codec_tag = 0;
125  }
126  av_dump_format(ofmt_ctx, 0, out_filename, 1);
127 
128  if (!(ofmt->flags & AVFMT_NOFILE)) {
129  ret = avio_open(&ofmt_ctx->pb, out_filename, AVIO_FLAG_WRITE);
130  if (ret < 0) {
131  fprintf(stderr, "Could not open output file '%s'", out_filename);
132  goto end;
133  }
134  }
135 
136  ret = avformat_write_header(ofmt_ctx, NULL);
137  if (ret < 0) {
138  fprintf(stderr, "Error occurred when opening output file\n");
139  goto end;
140  }
141 
142  while (1) {
143  AVStream *in_stream, *out_stream;
144 
145  ret = av_read_frame(ifmt_ctx, &pkt);
146  if (ret < 0)
147  break;
148 
149  in_stream = ifmt_ctx->streams[pkt.stream_index];
150  if (pkt.stream_index >= stream_mapping_size ||
151  stream_mapping[pkt.stream_index] < 0) {
152  av_packet_unref(&pkt);
153  continue;
154  }
155 
156  pkt.stream_index = stream_mapping[pkt.stream_index];
157  out_stream = ofmt_ctx->streams[pkt.stream_index];
158  log_packet(ifmt_ctx, &pkt, "in");
159 
160  /* copy packet */
161  pkt.pts = av_rescale_q_rnd(pkt.pts, in_stream->time_base, out_stream->time_base, AV_ROUND_NEAR_INF|AV_ROUND_PASS_MINMAX);
162  pkt.dts = av_rescale_q_rnd(pkt.dts, in_stream->time_base, out_stream->time_base, AV_ROUND_NEAR_INF|AV_ROUND_PASS_MINMAX);
163  pkt.duration = av_rescale_q(pkt.duration, in_stream->time_base, out_stream->time_base);
164  pkt.pos = -1;
165  log_packet(ofmt_ctx, &pkt, "out");
166 
167  ret = av_interleaved_write_frame(ofmt_ctx, &pkt);
168  if (ret < 0) {
169  fprintf(stderr, "Error muxing packet\n");
170  break;
171  }
172  av_packet_unref(&pkt);
173  }
174 
175  av_write_trailer(ofmt_ctx);
176 end:
177 
178  avformat_close_input(&ifmt_ctx);
179 
180  /* close output */
181  if (ofmt_ctx && !(ofmt->flags & AVFMT_NOFILE))
182  avio_closep(&ofmt_ctx->pb);
183  avformat_free_context(ofmt_ctx);
184 
185  av_freep(&stream_mapping);
186 
187  if (ret < 0 && ret != AVERROR_EOF) {
188  fprintf(stderr, "Error occurred: %s\n", av_err2str(ret));
189  return 1;
190  }
191 
192  return 0;
193 }
